flowName: copy of import DQL rules all types
flowDesc: copy of import DQL rules all types

rules.sql: SELECT COUNT(${default_file_name}) FROM ANALYTICS.FACT_SALES f LEFT JOIN ANALYTICS.DIM_CUSTOMER c ON f.CUSTOMER_KEY = c.CUSTOMER_KEY WHERE c.CUSTOMER_KEY IS NULL
rules.description: Check for orphaned records in fact table

rules.sql: SELECT COUNT(${default_file_name}) FROM (SELECT BUSINESS_KEY FROM ANALYTICS.DIM_PRODUCT WHERE CURRENT_FLAG = 'Y' GROUP BY BUSINESS_KEY HAVING COUNT(${default_file_name}) > 1) AS DUP_CHECK
rules.description: Validate no duplicate records in dimension table

rules.sql: SELECT COUNT(${default_file_name}) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'STAGING' AND TABLE_NAME LIKE 'STG_%' AND LAST_ALTERED >= DATEADD(HOUR,-24,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())

rules.description: Verify data freshness - last ETL run date

rules.sql: SELECT COUNT(${default_file_name}) FROM ANALYTICS.FACT_ORDERS WHERE ORDER_DATE > CURRENT_DATE()
SELECT COUNT(${default_file_name}) FROM ANALYTICS.FACT_REVENUE WHERE CURRENCY_CODE NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT CURRENCY_CODE FROM ANALYTICS.DIM_CURRENCY WHERE IS_ACTIVE = TRUE)
SELECT COUNT(${default_file_name}) FROM ANALYTICS.FACT_PAYMENTS WHERE TRY_CAST(PAYMENT_AMOUNT AS NUMBER(18,2)) IS NULL AND PAYMENT_AMOUNT IS NOT NULL
rules.description: Check data type consistency - Amount fields

rules.sql: SELECT ABS(((SELECT COUNT(${default_file_name}) FROM ANALYTICS.DIM_CUSTOMER) - (SELECT ROW_COUNT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'ANALYTICS' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DIM_CUSTOMER')))
SELECT COUNT(${default_file_name}) FROM ANALYTICS.FACT_SALES WHERE (REVENUE_AMOUNT - COST_AMOUNT) / NULLIF(REVENUE_AMOUNT,0) < -0.5
rules.description: Validate business rule - Profit margin threshold

rules.sql: SELECT COUNT(${default_file_name}) FROM ANALYTICS.DIM_CUSTOMER WHERE CUSTOMER_ID IS NULL OR CUSTOMER_NAME IS NULL OR CREATED_DATE IS NULL
rules.description: Check for NULL values in mandatory fields

rules.sql: SELECT COUNT(${default_file_name}) FROM (SELECT CALENDAR_DATE FROM ANALYTICS.DIM_DATE WHERE CALENDAR_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(DAY,-30,CURRENT_DATE()) AND CURRENT_DATE() EXCEPT SELECT DISTINCT DATE(TRANSACTION_DATE) FROM ANALYTICS.FACT_TRANSACTIONS WHERE TRANSACTION_DATE >= DATEADD(DAY,-30,CURRENT_DATE())) AS GAP_CHECK
rules.description: Validate date ranges - No gaps in daily data

rules.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT TABLE_NAME) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'ANALYTICS' AND TABLE_NAME LIKE 'DIM_%'
SELECT COUNT(${default_file_name}) FROM (SELECT CUSTOMER_KEY FROM ANALYTICS.DIM_CUSTOMER WHERE CURRENT_RECORD_FLAG = 'Y' GROUP BY CUSTOMER_KEY HAVING COUNT(${default_file_name}) > 1) AS SCD_CHECK
rules.description: Validate SCD Type 2 - Single active record

rules.sql: SELECT COUNT(${default_file_name}) FROM ANALYTICS.FACT_SALES WHERE SALES_AMOUNT > (SELECT AVG(SALES_AMOUNT) + (3 ${default_file_name} STDDEV(SALES_AMOUNT)) FROM ANALYTICS.FACT_SALES)
rules.description: Check for data anomalies - Statistical outliers

rules.sql: SELECT COUNT(${default_file_name}) FROM ANALYTICS.ETL_AUDIT_LOG WHERE JOB_STATUS = 'FAILED' AND JOB_DATE = CURRENT_DATE() - 1
